name: Bitter Baller - Updated
description:
Roll and jump over obstacles in this platformer. Keep Bob safe and try to get to the end. You can jump twice to make the Bob and the Ball jump, but be careful, Bob must land on the ball again to survive.

Controls: 
'Left' or 'a' to move Left
'Right' or 'd' to move Right
'Space' to jump and 'Space' again to double jump

Bitter Baller was initially created for the Bitter Jam https://itch.io/jam/bitter-jam and used art assets provided by that jam
